dojo.name: The Arcanum
dojo.description: Training grounds for prompt architects. Master the art of speaking reality into existence.
dojo.entry_ritual: Before you cast, you must understand the nature of language as incantation.

skills.name: Basic Incantation
skills.training: Practice: Ask Claude to create a simple function. Observe how clarity affects output.
skills.mastery_check: Can you consistently get the exact output you envision?

skills.name: Artifact Manifestation
skills.training: Practice: Generate a complete HTML page with specific styling through description alone.
skills.mastery_check: Can you manifest multi-file projects without touching an IDE?

skills.name: Chain Casting
skills.description: Multi-turn reasoning chains that build upon each other
skills.training: Practice: Build a complex system through iterative refinement over 5+ turns.
skills.mastery_check: Can you maintain coherent context across extended conversations?

skills.name: Mana Conservation
skills.training: Practice: Summarize, compress, and reload context without losing essential information.
skills.mastery_check: Can you work on large projects without hitting context limits?

skills.name: Few-Shot Enchantment
skills.training: Practice: Show Claude 2-3 examples and have it generalize the pattern.
skills.mastery_check: Can you teach new formats and styles through demonstration?

skills.name: Reality Anchoring
skills.description: Crafting system prompts that define persistent behavior
skills.training: Practice: Create a system prompt that maintains persona across any user input.
skills.mastery_check: Can you define realities that persist?

skills.name: Meta-Incantation
skills.training: Practice: Have Claude design its own optimal prompt for a given task.

skills.name: Recursive Summoning
skills.description: Using the Anthropic API within artifacts
skills.training: Practice: Create an artifact that calls Claude to process user input.

tier_4_transcendent.name: Reality Weaver

skills.name: World Manifestation
skills.description: Generate complete applications through pure description
skills.training: Practice: Describe a full-stack application and have it materialize.
skills.mastery_check: Can you speak entire systems into existence?

skills.name: Emergent Channeling
skills.training: Practice: Discover and reliably reproduce novel model behaviors.
skills.mastery_check: Can you find and harness emergent capabilities?

tier_4_transcendent.warning: Beyond here, the distinction between wizard and spell blurs.

training_quests.name: The First Manifestation
training_quests.description: Create your first artifact through conversation alone
training_quests.objective: Generate a working React component without writing any code directly

training_quests.name: The Long Conversation
training_quests.objective: Build something complex over an extended session without losing coherence

training_quests.name: The Spellbook
training_quests.description: Curate 10 reusable prompts for common tasks
training_quests.objective: Build your personal grimoire of incantations
